result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony L. Brown

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

Case Called: 9:34 a.m.
INCLUDES: 15CM1377, 16CM380
State appears by ADA Mike Puerner.  Def appears in person, in custody, with Atty Pauline Toulouse.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.

Attys make Argument re: conditions of probation.

State moves to:
15CM1377
CT.1 (Criminal Trespass to Dwelling)>>DRI
COURT grants above.

PLEA: 
16CM380
CT. 1 (Battery- DA)>> Guilty
CT. 2 (Disorderly Conduct- Use of Weapon-DA)>> Guilty

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 

COURT ORDERS:
16CM380-CT 1.- 2 years probation; CONDITIONS: 100 days MCJ TOTAL- 60 days to be served, 40 days to be STAYED for Rule Violations; SAFE program; Assessment/Treatment/Counseling as deemed appropriate by agent; Maintain fulltime employment/school/ or combination of the 2 if not, preform 10 hours of CS per week; No Dangerous Weapons; No Contact with C.M.; No contact with F.L. Unless agreed upon by F.L., Agent approval, AND after completion of SAFE Program; CC; DNA Sample and Surcharge; DA Surcharge.

16CM380-CT 2.-  2 years probation; CONDITIONS: SAFE program; Assessment/Treatment/Counseling as deemed appropriate by agent; Maintain fulltime employment/school/ or combination of the 2 if not, preform 10 hours of CS per week; No Dangerous Weapons; No Contact with C.M.; No contact with F.L. Unless agreed upon by F.L., Agent approval, AND after completion of SAFE Program; CC; DNA Sample and Surcharge; DA Surcharge.

COURT notes 36 days credit if revoked on both counts.

Adj: 9:56 a.m.

Pre-trial conference at 03-09-2016 01:50 pm.
Final pre-trial at 03-30-2016 08:50 am.
Jury Trial at 04-11-2016 08:30 am.

INCLUDES 16CM380 & 15CM1377   Defendant shall not possess any dangerous weapons during the pendency of this action. Police escort to retrieve any personal belongings.   No contact with F.L. (NON WAIVABLE) & C.M. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
